duties_responsibilities.duty: Overall operation of the Store to ensure that Company standards and best practices are consistently met.
Staff, train, and develop leadership team to deliver desired sales and profit results while maintaining a friendly, easy-to-shop environment.
Manage the operations of the Stockroom, Front End, and Sales Floor to ensure new merchandise gets to the sales floor in a timely manner and goods are received properly.
Lead all Company Best Practices and maximize productivity by minimizing steps and touches while working.
Accept special assignments as directed by Leadership.
Conduct payroll administration and reporting as needed.
Maintain a safe and secure environment, ensuring all Associates understand and can execute emergency operating procedures.
Treat all Customers, Associates, and other leaders with respect and demonstrate courtesy, friendliness, and professionalism at all times.
Maintain a high standard of housekeeping and cleanliness.
Ensure recovery, sizing, and markdowns are completed to Company standards.
Train Associates on Loss Prevention programs and safeguard confidential information, cash, and merchandise.
Use all Store equipment, perform basic mathematical calculations, and supervise Assistant Store Manager, Area Supervisors, and Retail Associates.

education_certification.credential: Five or more years of Store management experience in a retail environment must maintain a high level of Customer service fluency in English must exercise considerable independent judgement and discretion ability to work evenings and weekends
